entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 7:30 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: N 54 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
